attributes.review: This took 69 days to download😘 Hoping it was worth the wait, I open the app only to see that there’s an orange on my screen😳😔 I am now blind and sad
attributes.title: Terrible🤢

attributes.review: So I download the app to see what his plans are for his election and it deleted everything off my phone like EVERYTHING now I have to get it all back smh🤦🏽‍♀️🤦🏽‍♀️

attributes.review: I open the app and not even 1 minute later I saw a million hate comments and they tryed starting to get all my info

attributes.review: Ok this app is TERRIBLE!! First off it took two WEEKS to download and as soon as I opened the app I became swamped with Danny Davito memes constantly and death threats from Donald Trump himself! I would not recommend this app to anyone! 🗑
I downloaded this app and now I keep getting texts from the campaign. My data and privacy are not being respected. Sad!
attributes.title: Sad

attributes.review: Literally not ok it glitches makes my phone not ok... I don’t think this is a good way to do things and trump is stupid so take the app down now
attributes.title: Bad

attributes.review: Horrible!! Kept making my phone crash and always showed me pictures of dog butts. What are you trying to do???
attributes.title: Horrible dog man

attributes.review: So like I didn’t know I would go blind for that sec after I opened the app. There was some Cheeto lookin guy with a red tie. I don’t think Cheetos should have their own app so um yea no
attributes.title: This ain’t it

attributes.review: this is truly the worst app i've ever seen. i really wish i could give zero stars. it crashes often and i didn't think it would be a horror game!!!!! the jumpscares even start right when you open the app! there's a scary orange clown monkey and they don't do a very good job at storytelling so the game isn't all that enjoyable. :/
attributes.title: oh my go🅱️
